这是一个模板说明页，PvZ2萌百编辑组正在对该模板在萌娘百科[[植物大战僵尸2]]条目中的应用进行测试，如果该测试最终失败，将会联系管理员进行删除。
该图鉴的原模板由PvZ FANDOM的贡献者编写 向他们表示衷心的感谢！ ;Description :Created by {{U|Uselessguy}}, this template is used to insert plant almanacs! ;Syntax :Type {{t|AlmanacNew|...}} somewhere. Then fill the <...> with the parameters. :{| border="1" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" style="border-collapse:collapse;" width="50%" ! Parameter !! Description |- | box title || optional, uses pagename template as default |- | icon || uses the image of the plant as it appears in the in-game Almanac, will use the Sunflower by default |- | type || changes the type of the Almanac image, sets as jpg by default |- | description header || functionally useful overview of the plant. Use [[Template:Almanac2New/Second Bar]] to show its specific stats.
(It is recommended to put {{Padding|0px}} after the last stat to give it some space.) |- | description || for the special features of the plant and for the flavor text, which is the sometimes nonsensical descriptions provided by PopCap |- | nostats || fill this parameter with anything if the plant has no statistics |} ;Sample output
